pullrequest.title: Port Box Contains plugin from SRCSim

content.raw: Yes, right now it only covers exact entities (not only models, but also links, etc). The use case for a "family" of models is interesting, but I think it could become time-consuming to loop through all entities in the world and comparing names. It would be nice if the world offered a function to get entities based on a regex...
content.html: Yes, right now it only covers exact entities (not only models, but also links, etc). The use case for a "family" of models is interesting, but I think it could become time-consuming to loop through all entities in the world and comparing names. It would be nice if the world offered a function to get entities based on a regex...
